wikipedia_page.main: Sir Richard Stagg  (born 27 September 1955) is a retired British diplomat who was ambassador to Bulgaria, high commissioner to India and ambassador to Afghanistan.

response: * 2007 – Sir Richard Stagg KCMG, British diplomat, the then British High Commissioner to India

link_mentions.page: List of High Commissioners of the United Kingdom to India

response: *  Richard Stagg, ambassador, Warden of Winchester College 2019–

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Afghanistan

response: *British High Commissioner to India Richard Stagg said in a statement "We condemn all forms of terrorism. It is a particularly worrying development that the judiciary and the legal system have been attacked. Our thoughts are with the affected families".

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Bulgaria

response: He retired from HM Diplomatic Service in April 2012 and was replaced by Sir Richard Stagg, formerly British High Commissioner to India. He has since worked in business.
